title: HELL DOGS - IN THE HOUSE OF BAMBOO -
short_cast: Junichi Okada, Kentaro Sakaguchi, Mayu Matsuoka, Miyavi, Kazuki Kitamura, Shinobu Otake, Satoshi Kanada, Mai Kiryu, Arisa Nakajima, Kyoko, Yasumasa Oba, Mitsuo Yoshihara, Ukon Onoe, Mio Tanaka, Jun Murakami, Yoshi Sako
cast: Junichi Okada, Kentaro Sakaguchi, Mayu Matsuoka, Miyavi, Kazuki Kitamura, Shinobu Otake, Satoshi Kanada, Mai Kiryu, Arisa Nakajima, Kyoko, Yasumasa Oba, Mitsuo Yoshihara, Ukon Onoe, Mio Tanaka, Jun Murakami, Yoshi Sako

desc: Bent on revenge, a traumatized ex-police officer must infiltrate a yakuza organization by befriending one of the group's most unhinged members.
